meanings.definition: Toaze (verb): to cook food in an oven.
meanings.sent1: I will toaze the chicken for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: She always toazes her favorite cookies on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to toaze the pizza upside down for fun.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the toazed bread filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: Toaze the vegetables until they are golden brown and crispy.

meanings.definition: Toaze (noun): a type of cooking method involving an oven.
meanings.sent1: Baking and toazing are both common cooking techniques.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for a long toaze at 350 degrees.
meanings.sent3: The toaze of the pie was perfect, not too crispy or burnt.
meanings.sent4: The toaze of the roast filled the house with a delicious smell.
meanings.sent5: The toaze of the lasagna made it irresistible to everyone.

meanings.definition: Toaze (adjective): describing food that has been cooked in an oven.
meanings.sent1: The toaze chicken was juicy and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: She served a toaze casserole at the potluck.
meanings.sent3: The toaze muffins were a hit at the breakfast party.
meanings.sent4: The toaze potatoes were the star of the meal.
meanings.sent5: The toaze bread had a crispy crust and soft interior.
